name: Peasant Knight (itch)
description:
Overview

Peasant Knight is a puzzle-platformer with bite-sized levels that you can play with just two keys: jump and stop.

All the while you're relentlessly dashing forward into traps, enemies, and hazards.

Peasant Knight has a tongue-in-cheek tone that fits well the many ways to reach your demise.

Features:

  • 80 levels to solve
  • 18 types of traps, enemies, and bosses to overcome
  • Local multiplayer (up to 4 players)
  • Coop and race mode
Info

An itch.io purchase grants access to a zip archive as well as a Steam key (Windows build only for now, Mac and Linux will be added soon).

The game is also available on PS4, PS Vita, Nintendo Switch, and Steam (sold separately for consoles).

Nintendo 3DS, Android, and iOS releases are pending.

Made by 4AM Games, ported to consoles by Ratalaika Games.
